title: Content Analysis of Patient-Reported Outcome Measures Used in Patients With Nail Conditions: A Systematic Review.
abstract: This systematic review identifies and examines the content of nail-specific patient questionnaires to understand if some instruments may be better suited to measuring different research outcomes.
